title: Eolas Medical 17+
appDescription: Eolas App is a tool to help innovate the way we educate our healthcare professionals and how we care for our patients. Access specific guidelines, online learning, and other useful resources from the palm of your hand. Streamline your department's induction and departmental teaching processes and knowledge sharing to save time and make everyone's work more efficient.

reviews.title: Must-have
reviews.review: Outstanding app and tool for clinical decision making, one of the must-have medical apps

reviews.title: OG app better
reviews.review: Agree with everyone else. Access to wikiem was much easier than having to go though this app to get to Wikiem. Idk why we messed with a good thing. Would love to just have access to wikiem again without having to go through the extra steps. Being able to pull out resources quickly is important for us EM doc. more

reviews.title: WikEM and MDCalc!
reviews.review: Easy access to two of my favorite utilities
